website_summaries.verdict: The right combination of quality, comfort, and affordability.
pros: Softness lasts well beyond the first few washes
Nice fit so they stay in place
Somewhat resistant to wrinkles and stains

customer_reviews.title: NOT the SAME sheets-Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy these sheets! I bought these sheets in March & September 2018. The sheets I received in January 2019 are not the same quality sheets. I ordered white sheets in twin, queen and king and they all had black lint on them AND they are very thin, not the silky softness that the past orders were. One set had black dirt (like machine grease) along a edge. The other set had a huge thread flaw (thick and discolored) running down the middle. Last year I recommended these sheets to everyone. The sheets are no longer the same that I received in 2018. Poor quality and dirty.
customer_reviews.author: D. Cummins

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: The fitted sheet fit snugly on my 10inch memory foam mattress. It wasn't loose. I'm a smelly 220lb college dude who does laundry bimonthly and when it do, I wash whites and colors together always on the same hot wash cycle and dry together on the hottest fastest cycle, which probably breaks all the rules on how to clean these sheets, but after the first wash of the sheets tinged my white socks slightly darker, I could clean these sheets together with all my white/dark clothes with the above described method without incident.
customer_reviews.author: shelined

customer_reviews.title: So far it's very good. They went through the washer really well they ...
customer_reviews.text: So far it's very good. They went through the washer really well they came out nice and silky. There is a little bit of lose threads near the edges but that's easily fixable. I'll update after I've spent a few weeks sleeping in it.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Buy em and Try em
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these by accident when I clicked One Click purchase. Best mistake I made in a while. These sheets are so soft. I have purchased some sheets from Bed, Bath, and Beyond and none of them have lasted. These sheets still feel amazing after half a year of use. Look at that price. They are holding strong.
customer_reviews.author: nmrtnz

customer_reviews.title: Fitted sheet is full of holes
customer_reviews.text: really nice material but fitted sheet had 4 holes in it. I have bought the 6 pack of the white sheets from Utopia bedding and never had this problem.
customer_reviews.author: always honest

customer_reviews.title: I ordered two of these and the sheets feel nice but both sets had stains and one of them ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these and the sheets feel nice but both sets had stains and one of them had runs in the fabric. Update: I've changed this from a 1 star to a 4 star. Right after I left this review I got an email from the company and they shipped replacement sheets out right away. I did not find any holes or stains on the new ones and I am very pleased with them! They're very soft comfortable sheets, and the company was wonderful to work with. I would order these sheets again.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these and the first thing i did was threw them in the wash so i could use them right away. For starters these do not feel good. They feel like 350 thread count. Secondly, they stained? Im thinking that you would have to wash these without some sort of detergent or else they will have an oil stain on them. So. Brand new. Ruined after washing. Feel terrible. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Bought these a few months ago and finally got around to needing them. Opened the package, through them in the washer and when I pulled the out of the washer, they were torn in the middle. There was a tear and a rip in 2 places. I double checked the outer packaging and there were not cuts or tears so they either came damaged or a cheap quality. I'm stuck with them now as it has been too long for me to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Redryder

customer_reviews.title: Sheets arrived damaged / written on
customer_reviews.text: I had originally planned to return these because they weren't quite as heavy as I had hoped. I left them in the original packaging and requested a return, however I didn't get them dropped off within the return window so I decided to use them on a guest bed. After opening the package I saw that one pillow case has writing on it. Was this from when they were packaged? Have they been previously returned and resold as new? Who knows. All I know is they are unusable as sheets. Oh and PS - they are also not wrinkle resistant. The attached picture is how they look straight from the dryer.
customer_reviews.author: TQueen

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and nearly see through
customer_reviews.text: Cheap price equal poor quality. This was a gamble. Why isn't the entire pillowcase hemmed? Why just half way? Do we tuck one side under the end of the pillow? I'll probably use these once just to see if they hold up, then just save for emergencies.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: See through sand paper.
customer_reviews.text: These are THE ACTUAL worst sheets ever. I was hopeful to find a good quality for the bed in our guest room but that was a fail. They are really rough and scratchy and they are really see through. Prisoners have better quality than these things. I had to rush to Walmart to get a set of sheets for our guests.
customer_reviews.author: TheGreatMAK

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this set for the guest bedroom and received unsolicited positive comments the first time out! I mean, seriously, as a guest in someone's home, is the first thing you'll notice and comment on going to be how soft and comfortable the sheets are?? Well, it happened. So, trust all the overwhelmingly positive reviews on this product. They're not made up, or submitted by Russian trolls! These sheets are the real deal...soft and incredibly comfortable. The dark gray color was spot on to the color sample. They seem durable and are definitely wrinkle-free. Buy with confidence, and at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: gt

customer_reviews.title: Holes near seam of bottom sheet
customer_reviews.text: After reading an Apartment Therapy post raving about these, I ordered and received my set of Utopia sheets. They felt nice but had a strange chemical smell. I threw them in the wash on delicate and went to put them on the bed after drying. While making the bed, I noticed a couple of holes right on the corner seam. I don't think I can return the item as I've washed it and will never get it back into the packaging. I realize these are inexpensive, but come on, have some measure of quality control people.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel V.

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: Yes these are soft but questionable as far as fit. They seem to be like someone ran them up on a sewing machine before they stuffed them into a bag. I could never figure out how to place the bottom sheet on the bed. There is some sort of strange elastic in the periphery and it does not apply itself to a fit.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Fitted sheet shrunk severely
customer_reviews.text: I expected low quality for the price, but I didn't need anything fancy. What I didn't expect is that over the course of three washings the fitted sheet would shrink so much as to not fit my air mattress. Took them off the bed, washed and dried them, and no matter how much I tried could not fit them back on that same day. The fit tightened after the first two washings but at least could still be used. Will avoid this brand in the future, especially after reading the other one-star reviews.
customer_reviews.author: L. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: NOT NEW!
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews but had to with this item. When I opened the package to wash before use, there were what looked like foundation or light dirt marks on both the pillow cases. There were also black threads bunched up in different areas of the sheets (didn't take photos of the threads). I'm so grossed out. I bought new, not used. I suggest stay away from these
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Deep Pocket Sheets
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how well these sheets fit my bed. I have a double pillowtop mattress and usually have to order sheets that are specifically described as being "Deep Pocket." These were not very expensive and I didn't note how deep the fitted sheet was when I ordered it. So I took a gamble on them. Needless to say the pockets are very deep - they not only fit my mattress but are able to be tucked underneath all sides and corners of my mattress so the fitted sheet stays on. Very pleased with the quality and softness too. These are certainly worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Featherbrainednotions

customer_reviews.title: Crusty unidentifiable stain right out of the package
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for these sheets. They felt soft out of the package but as I was about to put them in the washer to wash before use, I noticed several spots of discoloration that looked like staining (I ordered white). They were orange-y/rust colored spots and was going to overlook them (and hope they would come out in the wash) until I noticed another spot that was actually crusty. I immediately repackaged them and started my return. I’ll stick with reputable brands from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Rhiannon Fry

customer_reviews.title: High and clean
customer_reviews.text: Microfiber doesn’t feel great, but my stains from eating in bed don’t show up so that’s nice. B+ if you’re a single stoner. The sides of the sheets are also a bit "saggy". I wish the elastic fit more firmly around the mattress, but I guess it's good if you have one of those extra thick mattresses. Contrary to what I said above, I'm actually a clean perfectionist, and it bugs me a bit. If you're not particular about things like that, it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: Brixton

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are extremely rough for starters. When I got it delivered the pillow cases did not even come with the sheets so now I have to return and get something that ACTUALLY comes with the set. Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Wish I didn't purchase.
customer_reviews.text: So I bought these because of the reviews. I finally put them on my bed today. I was highly disappointed. They arent really black. They are off dingy black. I know because I had to buy extra pillow cases for my bed. And it's a huge difference. They are cheaply made. The band in the bottom of the fitted sheet is very loose. I'm convinced it will snap at any point. They arent rough and hard. But they are super thin. I won't be buying these again. Honestly the Walmart brand is the same price, and way more durable. Also they arent off black. Hahaha
customer_reviews.author: Ayla Strickland

customer_reviews.title: Nice sheets, but they're massive pet hair magnets.
customer_reviews.text: I like these sheets. They're comfortable, they breathe well, they're relatively wrinkle free, and they were very reasonably priced. The one downside is that they're massive pet hair magnets. When I put these sheets on my bed they accumulate more pet hair in 48 hours than the various brands of cotton sheets I otherwise use accumulate in a week. I'm running through loads of lint roller sheets between washings. If this doesn't bother you, then I think these are very good sheets at this price point, but if you have pets, you have been warned.
customer_reviews.author: npc

customer_reviews.title: OMG These are a bit too small
customer_reviews.text: I spent 30 minutes trying to put this fitted sheet on. In the end I just Hulk smashed the darn thing yeah it tore but its on there now. Last time I buy this brand; I guess you get what you paid for, but man at least make it fit. I bought a full-size set and I literally lifted the mattress on its side trying to get this thing on there. In the end my back was killing me and I would pay a extra $20 just to shove it up someones !$!@ It's on there now, torn in a corner but i don't care for 15$ bucks its not worth dealing with.
customer_reviews.author: E. Lorenzi

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying I like expensive sheets. Once I invested, I never went back. That being said, I bought these for my son. The reviews were good, the price was right. Out of the package they felt really soft. I washed them, they were still soft but they picked up all kinds of lint, and anything it came in contact with. As soon as I shook them out to make the bed I could see how see through they were and I knew the quality wasn't so great. My son loves them. That's all that matters. They're not bad! But definitely not high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: They showed up dirty...
customer_reviews.text: We just received these today and upon opening them my 17yo daughter asked me if I had bought the sheets used and I said no why? She then showed me the dirt that was all over them. I was very disappointed bc we had literally just took them out of the package. We're throwing them in the washer and bleaching them and hoping they come clean, if not, then I guess I'll be returning them. I wish I had a better review of these but unfortunately I don't. I can't review the softness or stain resistance of them yet bc we have yet to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Bryant Dowell

customer_reviews.title: Hate them
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these recently and was very disappointed in the quality. They feel scratchy, they're see-through (opaque when on the bed), and they had a weirdly shiny top hem on the upper sheet -- like a silk-edged blanket but it was just the sheet material. This shiny portion made them look even cheaper. We got some sheets recently from Amazon that were much softer, thicker and more lustrous, at a pretty comparable cost -- I think that was Meila, or Mellonin, the one that's getting pushed on Amazon right now as "the sheets everyone is raving about." THOSE sheets were awesome.
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: Its a nice looking sheet but...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sheet for my boy's bedroom. I don't know if it is the color or the type of fabric, but it REALLY shows up drool. (Yes, I know that's gross). They are 5 and 8 and their pillow cases and anywhere else they sleep have clear white marks in the morning that I just never see on other sheets. I can never keep these sheets on the bed for more than a couple days before they look super bad. I think I would buy these sheets again (I think) the quality might be a little thin and ployestery but thats what you pay for. However, I definitely recommend it in a lighter color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You’d be crazy not to BUY THESE SHEETS!!!
customer_reviews.text: I read lots of reviews and even a close friend suggested these to me. I was still skeptical bc of the price. I am beyond please that I decided to go ahead and give them a chance. If there was any negative thing to say, it would be that the elastic in the fitted sheet feels thin and tight. I was worried it might break the first time I put it on. It definitely didn’t break and the sheets laundered quite nicely. They are soft and comfortable. Feel very nice and especially for the price. I will purchase another set soon. Very very highly recommend especially for quality and value. Would’ve given 10 stars if it was an option.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne S

customer_reviews.title: Like the company and their linen - but it arrived with two stains on it!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Utopia's sheets for awhile, and I love their products and the price. I have multiple fitted sheets to rotate, and even use one as a covering on the living Ottoman. (Very Cape Cod cottage closed for the winter look!) But I just opened the sheet set that I had bought for my new mattress - and there were two stains. How could there be stains on a new sheet? It doesn't LOOK used, but there they were. Pictures attached. Those were two different stains!
customer_reviews.author: HeathCliff

customer_reviews.title: Top sheet WAY TOO small.
customer_reviews.text: PROS: Material is soft So far no pulls in the fabric Thin for summer use (can be taken as a con depending on how long you want material to last, but these sheets are very affordable) CONS: I ordered a CalKing, the sizing is strange to say the least. The fitted sheet is baggy but can be tucked under mattress (everyday) to stretch the wrinkles and extra material away. The top sheet is so small it barely covers the top of the mattress, leaving about an inch to drape over either side of the mattress. (pictures of this are posted).
customer_reviews.author: K.McHugh

customer_reviews.title: Color was not baby blue
customer_reviews.text: While the sheets seem very nice and soft, the color was way off which is the only reason I'm giving them this rating. I ordered baby blue sheets and the color I received was definitely more aqua (more green than blue aqua) than baby blue. I guess blues/greens can be tough to decipher as everyone sees them a bit differently, but for my color scheme which is definitely baby blue and navy. this will never match, it's not even close. Might try to order in white and just go with that.
customer_reviews.author: km3x3hd

customer_reviews.title: Great set, great price! On the thinner side...
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this bedding set (especially for the price)!! We thought it would be pretty iffy because of the price, but it's our softest sheet set. Thinner than our sheets from Target (Threshold), but they didn't feel thin and scratchy like other "bargain" or off brand sheets I've used in the past. The only downside is that there is tons of static when you move around a lot.... it lights up and shocks you! Maybe that's just with us, but it seems to do it even after washing & drying multiple times.
customer_reviews.author: Nikafrik

customer_reviews.title: Won't stay on my bed!
customer_reviews.text: I love the feel of these sheets. The color has dulled a bit after a few washes which isn't a big deal. My biggest issue with these sheets is that they will NOT stay on my bed. Seriously, every morning the sheets have completely come off the corners and top edge of the bed and I have to put them back on. I've NEVER had sheets do this so badly before. Not sure if I got 2 dud sets or what, but it's definitely a pain in the...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t fit
customer_reviews.text: EDIT: these sheets hang on to my dogs hair so badly! I literally cannot even lint roll it off. If you have a light colored dog that sheds these are not for you. I bought these for my king size mattress. Needed something cheap cus we sized up from a full and just needed temporary sheets. The fitted sheet barely fit on the mattress, and the top sheet only went 6 inches down both sides, couldn’t be tucked in. Kind of a nuisance that they don’t even really fit
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, thin elastic
customer_reviews.text: This is my second set of these sheets. The first pair for my Cal King are amazing. This new set I bought for my guest room, are terrible! Total bummer. They are soft like budda, but when I went to put them on, the fitted sheet snapped. This was the very first time I used them! I just washed them for the first time :(
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Great Color, Soft
customer_reviews.text: Have to admit, wasn't expecting a lot with such a low price. Was very pleasantly surprised. Sheets washed up very nicely. Retained dark navy blue color. Very soft. Brand new, so can't really comment on staining or durability. A nice feature I haven't seen elsewhere was on the pillowcases. They are sewn so as to tuck in the pillow, keep it in place instead of just an open sleeve. Something I wouldn't have requested, but really like. Took off one star (very picky) for a corner that tends to creep up (mattress is very thick) despite the elastic around the bottom sheet. Would have a expected to pay double, or more, for this quality.
customer_reviews.author: Big Mean

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the price. Are they the most awesome of sheets ever? Not really but they arent $200 sheets. It's a good bang for your buck. I'm purchasing my send set but it's been a little over a year so I hope they are the same. My one little complaint is they only made it about a year before getting little holes ,thread pulls and stretched out beyond repairt. But, it the sheets defense, I only ever have 1 pair at a time and wash them weekly
customer_reviews.author: Meda

customer_reviews.title: They will end up with oil like spots after you wash....
customer_reviews.text: They feel nice but I washed them as soon as I got them and they already have dark spots on them. It looks like oil spots. I just bought my washer and dryer and I have washed several loads so I know it wasn't that. I am kind of disappointed since they are brand new. Probably won't buy another set.
customer_reviews.author: brittany travis

customer_reviews.title: I had to correct the seamstress's  mess!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 sets of these sheets (more than I normally spend, but wanted nice ones) however I have had to restitched the top sea where it was folded down on BOTH sets as the seamstress completely missed the edge she was sewing down!! Very poor quality control guys!! Didn't want the inconvenience of sending them back so sewed them up, but I shouldn't have had to do that...especially for that price...
customer_reviews.author: goat

customer_reviews.title: What a mess!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these thinking they would keep their colour better but I can not use them they leave black pieces all over my white duvet and floor. I have had to clean my duvet constantly since I put them on my bed. Black sheets white duvet does not work with these. If you don't mind fuzzy pieces all over your room and rest of your bedding these will work. I will be donating these I cannot use them.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Star

customer_reviews.title: nice sheets, fits nicely over a big mattress pad with lots of room to fit under the mattress itself!
customer_reviews.text: I love these sheets! I needed a new set to match my new comforter that I bought and these are pretty soft and nice to sleep on. I don't notice any tears or frayed pieces of fabric, and the stretchy sheet was nice and big enough to tuck under deep to keep our mattress pad in place unlike our old sheets where the corners kept rolling up because they weren't tight enough.
customer_reviews.author: ali

customer_reviews.title: Best company & A++ product.
customer_reviews.text: I think I found my new favorite company. These sheets are amazing. They’re silky soft. They have some wrinkles but that’s to be expect. No bed set comes wrinkle free. Sleeping will get the wrinkles out anyway. Perfect condition. NO holes OR stains like other people “claim there to be”. But some people just need something to complain about no matter how perfect something is. I will without a doubt be recommending this company to others & I will be a returning costumer. Shipping took 1 day. I just can’t get over how amazing these are. As you can see in the pic, my dog even love them. Thanks again.
customer_reviews.author: Erica R. Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Lint
customer_reviews.text: I do not know how these sheets will feel or wear. I Love Utopia sheets, but I usually buy the cotton ones. I absolutely Love the elastic all the way around too. The ONE thing I do know is that I bought these and immediately washed them with no problems, but when I dried them and opened my dryer, my dryer was coated in gobs of black lint. I actually had to wipe my dryer out with a damp cloth and the lint screen was coated with blank lint 1-2" thick. Was SO SHOCKED! Didn't think they would shed like this. If buying these, make sure you wash them ALONE!! Praying they don't shed with every washing.
customer_reviews.author: S. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: No complaints here! I give them 5 stars overall as they are definitely 5/5 for the price I paid, great quality for the money. More wrinkle free than your typical sheets. The bottom most sheet that stretches over the mattress isn't "tight" on my mattress, but this isn't a problem as it's not "loose" either -- so take other's perspectives on that with a grain of salt. I honestly prefer my bottom most sheet to come on and off the mattress more easily for cleaning purposes rather than struggle getting it on/off just to have a slightly crisper look to the made bed that no one would notice anyways unless they are a hotel reviewer. Would recc!
customer_reviews.author: L.

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: Not only do these sheets BARELY fit a queen pillow top, as advertised, they fall apart after two washes. Here's a freebie, they SMELL!!! if you sweat, even minuscule amounts while you sleep, the sheets, give off a vinegar like odor. Stay away. Buy in store, everything online is advertised as gold but breaks down. Cheap synthetic fibers, trash import, cost to make was prob 85 cents
customer_reviews.author: John Bodkin

customer_reviews.title: Pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Bought gray king, for a queen mattress. Have purchased all kinds and even expensive brand with extra deep pockets, but always a struggle to put them on. For the price, I thought try king size. It works fine, except the pillow cases. But I am aware. It is really easy care, and wrinkle free. Less drying time, too. So I am buying a queen size for the other mattress, which is not as thick, but will need at least 16".
customer_reviews.author: JMan

customer_reviews.title: Feels good to sleep on
customer_reviews.text: I have a few sets of Egyptian cotton sheets and really like the feel of them,this does feel different then they do but its a good different.They don't allow my to slide around as easily as my other sheets but do feel like quality sheets.I plan on getting a few more sets of these in the future.Very good feel in the cold winter months compared to my normal sheets.I can't speak on durability because I've only had them a short time...
customer_reviews.author: Geekinhiemer

customer_reviews.title: Best value for truly wrinkle free sheets
customer_reviews.text: I love these sheets and use them in my vacation rentals as well as home. Never a problem with wrinkles and they feel and look good as well. They do fade somewhat in color and wear out after a few months of daily washing and use at my rentals, but that's expected with any sheet. At their low price I can afford to loose some to stains and wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: PIA1100

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Sheets are super thin. I washed them one time and already had a hole and the seam is falling apart. I would not purchase this product again!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole L. Littlefield

customer_reviews.title: SOOOO Soft!!!
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are SO soft! I washed them immediately, per the instructions and they washed well. It will take a few washings to get the creases from them being in the packaging, I'm sure, so I'll update my review after I've had them for a while. First impression is great, though. I'm a hot sleeper and they are completely comfortable so far. Of course, it is winter here with lows in the 40's, so that may be helping...The stitching seems to be solid and the color (grey) has not come off on anything. I liked them so much, I bought another set!
customer_reviews.author: ASRAZ

customer_reviews.title: Try These Sheets You Will Love
customer_reviews.text: I like cotton and polyester sheets, so I was unsure as to purchasing these. The price is great. Upon receiving this set, I washed them. They came out 95% wrinkle free. I LOVE the color. The beige is beautiful. Not just a hint, but like the color I like for my coffee with cream. Ha They are soft, not hot or cold, just right. I have a small mattress 11" and have been looking for a tighter fit for the bottom sheet. The elastic around this sheet is great, no wrinkles at all. I would recommend and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: Low quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Washed and used the sheets and they got little balls on them. Very scratchy, very uncomfortable. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Nutt

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Like many others, I also received the bed sheets with a couple of stains on them. I’m not sure what they are, so be sure to wash the sheets prior to using. The stains came out after washing. Also, compared to Nestl bedding, Nestl bedding is definitely noticeably softer. However, this Utopia bedding is still pretty soft and comfortable on its own (without being compared to Nestl). Overall, I think there are a couple flaws, but it is a decent bedding bed sheet set at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: They came stained
customer_reviews.text: My sheets came stained as if they had little dried bloodstains here and there. The fabric was soft but who wants sheets that come pre-dirtied?
customer_reviews.author: Jolie Colin

customer_reviews.title: Corrected
customer_reviews.text: Sheets came with a weird stain on it. Very disappointed. I'm editing this review because the seller sent me a new set of sheets and I thought that was very nice since and unexpected. The sheets are soft and I think the dark gray color looks luxurious.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: DEEP Pockets!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased! Just pulled up my purchase from July 2019 so I could order another set! I have had these sheets in my rotation for 9-10 months now and they have held up great through MANY washings. I change my sheets weekly, and only have about 3 sets. They don't make me sweat in the summer (52 yr old woman here) and I dont freeze in the winter. Fit my large pillow top queen mattress great! I don't have to struggle to get them on at all! Lots of elastic in the corners to work with. all the seems on the sheets and pillow cases are still intact, no fraying anywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the $20!
customer_reviews.text: I loved these. I washed them immediately after taking them out of the package. I would suggest that to anyone. So if they had any of the stains other people were talking about in their reviews then idk. All I know is the sat in the dryer for over an hour after it was done and came out perfect. They’re super comfortable and soft. The closest thing to a problem I had was that it was too deep even for my pillow top California king mattress, but that just allows more room to tuck it under. Definitely worth the $20!!
customer_reviews.author: Patti T.

customer_reviews.title: Thin and cheap
customer_reviews.text: I don't always believe you get what you pay for, but in this case it's true. I'm keeping these very thin cheap sheets as a back-up set because my husband systematically ruins all of our sheets and I needed an extra set. The pillow case openings have completely come apart where the hem is sewed down - both of them. I bought the baby blue CAL King and it's more like a light turquoise, which I really like. The fitted sheet is very deep which is also a plus. If you are looking for some just okay sheets, here ya go.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Farrell

customer_reviews.title: GREAT COST, FEELS SOFT, LOOK GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Color was wonderful and price was just right. Purchased these for the guest room. Wanted something that I could purchase a couple of sets of and not worry that my guests would think they are the bottom of the barrel sheets! These worked on all areas! These are soft, do not pill and wash well. They have a great color and I have had no issue with them at all. They are soft and are comfortable. Definitely a must purchase when you need some extra sets. Not sure how durable they would be over long term as these are not utilized as much in my home. Will update if there are any issues or concerns.
customer_reviews.author: Cpronzato

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable bedsheets
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure why Amazon asked me if these were stain resistant because I’m not sure I’ve ever seen any bedsheets that are. These are nice cheap sheets that get the job done. You don’t always need the highest Egyptian quality for it to be something comfortable to sleep on. I would recommend these they’re fine and they work.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Jean

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: For the price I paid for I consider this item value. It isn't the softest cloth I have used on my bed but it doesn't have to be. And after washing it and low setting dried it the wrinkles came off and it looks nice. Depending what color you get(I got grey) stain will definitely show up at some point and they will be visible.
customer_reviews.author: Ugo Moso

customer_reviews.title: Thin, uneven dyed. not goo very disappointed UTOPIA
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in these. Thought theyd be thicker . Very thin and boitom Sheet not fitting reg thick maytress. I think its defective. I hope utopia reached iut to me mbc these are not even worth the $. The black is not solid throughout the set like it dyed wrong . Needed these sheets so disappointed. New bed now no sheets pin hole near elastic on bottom sheet elsstuc will open if i dint sew but too much wring w these. To sew. And i shouldnt have to fix mew sheets
customer_reviews.author: Stacy h

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, cool, and washed well
customer_reviews.text: I don’t often write reviews for amazon purchases, but these sheets are awesome. I just bought a king size bed on an impulse and needed sheets ASAP. These were cheap and I didn’t have much of an expectation at all...just needed the bed covered. However, these sheets are SOFT and cool. No tugging to try to get the perfect fit, went on so easily. I have only washed them once just to get them on the bed immediately but I will definitely be buying another set.
customer_reviews.author: Renee T.

customer_reviews.title: Good product and great service
customer_reviews.text: I initially gave this set a 3 Starr review as a seam in the pillow case developed a rip after only a week. The manufacturer saw my review and contacted me. I was offered a partial refund or replacement of the item. Today I received a whole new set from Utopia. 5 star for great customer relations. The sheets are soft and wash up well. I'm quite happy with both the manufacturer and product.
customer_reviews.author: Irene Warwick

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and wrinkle free, these sheets are a good value.
customer_reviews.text: After my standard immediate washing of this set when they arrived, I replaced my dog-ripped sheets that were currently on my bed. These sheets are GREAT! Not only do they come standard with no rips or tears caused by dog or other pet claws, but they are extremely comfortable, and they didn't wrinkle as fast as other sheets I own. Granted, that means that I might not remember to wash them as often, but I'll just have to put a reminder up, haha. In all seriousness, I was very pleased with these sheets, they did stay wrinkle free over the week I had them on my bed, and their price was amazing considering the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kent M.

customer_reviews.title: Overall good product
customer_reviews.text: There hasnt been an instance to test the stain resistance. Material is firm, almost loud when pressed upon. The color does not fade when washed, washed several times already. Would prefer a six piece set which could include additional two pillowcases. Material is firm, does not stretch around the mattress corners with forgiveness.......pretty difficult to pull over. When it is pulled over, it will not accidentally come off which is great.
customer_reviews.author: Hawaiian Breeze

customer_reviews.title: Microfiber sheet set
customer_reviews.text: Got these as a lightning deal. These are very nice sheets. Not to thin and very sofa. I washed them as instructed and they came out perfect. If I have one complaint it wouldn't be that the small decoration on the front of the pillowcases doesn't go around to the back but that the part that folds over is not sewn down. It's not a big deal but about 10 seconds of sewing would have made a more finished looking product. I have none of the complaints some of the other reviewers were talking about. The color is spot on and they come out of the dryer almost wrinkle free.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon S.

customer_reviews.title: Good sheets so far
customer_reviews.text: They've survived their first wash which I was worried about since I'm wary of affordable things I buy off amazon. I'll try to update later after more use. I love their look and how they fit my mattress. My only complaint is that the sort of matte looking material really shows any kind of debris (my cat jumps on them and leaves perfect faded little dusty prints) and it's something I've noticed from other sorts of matte material bed sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki M

customer_reviews.title: Soft, good fit, but color was unexpected
customer_reviews.text: Most important part first: they are comfy and the pockets are deep, so even with a mattress topper they fit our queen bed great. Great value! Color wise, they weren’t what I expected, though. We got the spa blue, and based on the pics and the name, I thought these would be more like a pool/aqua blue. But, they were somewhere between toothpaste blue and robin’s egg blue. Pretty, but loud!! Wasn’t a deal breaker, just unexpected.
customer_reviews.author: Logan H.

customer_reviews.title: Best sheets ever!
customer_reviews.text: You cannot beat the quality for price of these sheets. They are sooo soft and make the bed feel so much more luxurious. One thing I will note is that it does fit a little large, and we have a king mattress. I don’t know if that’s the sheet or our bed though. Another notable thing I enjoy about these sheets is that dog hair (and random pieces of dirt the dog always seems to bring with him lol) doesn’t stick and brushes right off. I have done a lot of research, and in my opinion the quality of these sheets are unbeaten. Very happy and will be purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: Jared McGill

customer_reviews.title: These sheets are amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked at how good of a deal these sheets are. The material is really nice and the color is great too! My only complaint is that the first time I washed them all of my laundry detergent ended up on one spot and it somehow stained it. It's not a big deal since its the fitted sheet and no one ever sees it besides me. It does lighten a little each time I wash them though. I strongly recommend checking these sheets out.
customer_reviews.author: Marie C

customer_reviews.title: Soft, wrinkle resistant, and well worth the cost!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Utopia Bedding Sheet set and was not sure what to expect since I bought them online and was not able to touch and feel them first. I was very pleasantly surprised! The sheets are soft, wrinkle resistant, and they make the task of making the bed a breeze. I do not iron my sheets, and you could not tell that I don't with these. I would definitely purchase these again, however I think it will take a while before these wear out. The sheets we purchased were for deep pockets, so they seem a little loose. If you want a tight fit, this may be an issue for you. It isn't for me.
customer_reviews.author: SBAmazon

customer_reviews.title: These are not the sheets you're looking for.
customer_reviews.text: This sheet set looked nice online, but upon arrival, I noticed that the fitted sheet color did not quite match that of the cover sheet or pillow cases. As normal, I washed everything before putting it on, but it didn't help. The other issue I have is that the pillow cases are too short - our normal-sized pillows keep popping out of their cases, especially during the night! There's supposed to be a fold-in flap to prevent this, but it's way too ineffective to be of any use. The sheets themselves are nonetheless comfortable, they just look terrible. Not sure what to do; maybe I'll get invited to a Toga party...
customer_reviews.author: Maxlactica

customer_reviews.title: Comfy & Cozy!😍
customer_reviews.text: VERY NICE, SO SO SOFT on my Queen size sleigh bed & the fitted sheet securely fits my bed Without keep coming up like most cheaply made sheet sets but THESE STAY PUT & DON'T MOVE AT ALL!!! It's worth the price on Amazon which is Not much at all compared to the stores + they're Not all thin & see thru like the cheap one's are!! & they're really SUPER SOFT without that COLD feel on your body when you get in bed & I Will DEFINITELY be ordering more Real Soon...YES I'm Very Pleased!!!🛏😍🤟🏽
customer_reviews.author: Ms.Kiki💁🏽‍♀️💋

customer_reviews.title: Damaged and cheap material
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't even sure I wanted to give these sheets 2 stars but I guess you get what you pay for. The material is very thin and cheap, almost like paper and one of the pillow cases arrived with a giant hole in the seam. I read the reviews before ordering these and I thought that for the price they would be good starter sheets but they're aweful. We will be returning them and the matching comforter we ordered from the same company. Save your money and spend $10 more on a pair of actually nice sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Don't know what happened
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these and when I received them I washed them. They are soft to the touch and couldn't wait to sleep on them. Within a couple of hours I noticed I was itching a lot on my legs and my arms. I realized that I had a rash from the sheets. It could be that my skin may be sensitive to Micro fiber as I have never had these types of sheets before and I do have sensitive skin or the material is cheap. I don't know. I gave 2 stars because they are very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Joonbi

customer_reviews.title: So far - so good
customer_reviews.text: Certainly better than anything you can get at this price. We had no problems with the order and just put the set on the bed. Everything was the same color and everything fit our queen bed fine (no problems like I read in some of the other lower star reviews - I always read the one-stars to get some ideas on the possible things that could go wrong). I'll repost after washing, but so far, so good. We're going to grab another set while the price is still there.
customer_reviews.author: John F. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Drop color, not soft , not wrinkles.not stainless
customer_reviews.text: It is cheap and wrinkles. But it drop drop color every time I do laundry, it always make other clothes black/blue. I don’t And it’s not soft at all. I don’t understand those people who reviewed it as soft. And it isn’t stainless . My baby spit a little bit on it, i couldn’t get it off except put it in washing machine. I don’t think it’s good for our skin. It jus big piece of cheap cloth !
customer_reviews.author: Happy Luo

customer_reviews.title: Great price plus great quality equals awesome deal!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! Super inexpensive but great quality! I love when the elastic runs all the way around because it keeps the sheets from slipping off the corners. These stay put, they're soft, wash easy and great color choices. I'm ordering more because you can't beat the price and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Just a girl in this world

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price, but not great.
customer_reviews.text: These sheets seem to be well made from durable material. I have washed them 3 times now and I haven’t noticed any fading. I thought they would have been softer, judging by the other reviews. Maybe after a few more washings they will get softer. One thing that was a bit annoying is that I had to wash them 2 times to get all of the little fuzz balls of of them. If they hold up well, I would probably buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Material feels good. But has chemical smell. Maybe 1 wash will help the smell.
customer_reviews.text: Great value. It feels nice. But it does have a "Made in China" smell. You know that chemical smell? I think maybe after one wash it will disappear? Honestly sellers should be more honest with the material and the chemical emitted from their products. This way we can judge if we want to save money here or protect our health first. I have asthma so I don't have a choice sometimes to buy cheap items. Sellers should be more honest and stop the f -a-k-e reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Piano

customer_reviews.title: I'm a grown man sleeping in a twin bed, and this bedding is perfect for my bed and needs
customer_reviews.text: I know. I know. Most adults are not sleeping in twin beds, but I am. I'm short, and I don't move while I sleep, so a bed this size is perfect for me. Finding bedding for it is not always the easiest, but this set was perfect. Great material. Easy to put on the bed. Just what I needed when I got ready to change my bedding this year. Love that is feels great, is affordable and something that will last. Enjoying mine so far. Glad I made the choice to give it a shot.
customer_reviews.author: Cyrus Webb

customer_reviews.title: SO SOFT. DEEP POCKETS. WORTH EVERY PENNY.
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are so soft! They aren’t super thin like some sheets, but not too thick either. I don’t always make my bed in the morning, so I don’t expect them to be wrinkle free when they’re balled up all day.. but the fitted sheet has not wrinkled. The fitted sheet has deep pockets so it fits over my thick mattress topper and mattress. My husband hasn’t complained of the fitted sheet snapping up and smacking him in the face, so I guess they’re a keeper! I bought the tan and now I’m ordering white!
customer_reviews.author: Allyson Whitt

customer_reviews.title: Great Sheets, but weak stitching
customer_reviews.text: Washed and dried them before putting on my bed. The stitching of one corner of the fitted sheet came loose the very first time I put the sheet on the bed. Still giving it 4 stars because otherwise the sheets are outstanding. Feels amazingly soft and comfortable...much better than more expensive sheets I have. And you simply cannot beat the price. I'm going to reinforce the stitching on all the corners of the fitted sheet and I suspect these will then last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these sheets after reading the positive reviews. I received a couple of days ago. I immediately washed them but didn't put them on my bed until yesterday. I slept on them for the first time last night. They are a little softer than your typical cheap sheets. It's thin material which I was seeking for the summer months. It's still cold here in Michigan so I cannot speak for use in warm months. These are not high quality sheets and I will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Deedahbaby

customer_reviews.title: Soft, but threads flying out everywhere after 2nd wash
customer_reviews.text: The sheets are soft and feel nice to sleep in. My problem is this is the second time they’ve been in the wash, and the threads are coming out from almost every stitch of both the top sheet and mattress sheet. They’re not expensive, but it feel a little excessive when I took them out and they have feet of threads falling out just from washing. Still debating on returning, they’re so cheap I’m not sure if it’s worth if
customer_reviews.author: Kelsie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sheet set!
customer_reviews.text: These are WONDERFUL!! I washed them right after I opened them and they didnt seem to shrink at all.. They are still pretty wrinkled, but I think thats just newness. They are super soft! They went on very easily. Great fit. The ONLY thing I don't care much for (but its not a deal breaker) is the pillowcases seem to be an oversized king. I have memory foam pillows in king size and always fit normal cases without any issues, but there is ALOT of extra on these. Like I said- not a deal breaker. The color (Navy) is a very true navy. And matched the comforter I ordered perfectly! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mysti Lucero

customer_reviews.title: Nice and soft!
customer_reviews.text: We needed new sheets, so I figured I'd give these a try. I bought two sets and we love them! The elastic on the fitted sheet goes all the way around, so the fitted sheet never comes untucked. I washed and dried them before putting them on the bed and they came out of the dryer with no wrinkles. They're also really soft, so they feel nice against your skin. I'll be buying more sets in the future.
customer_reviews.author: W. A. McKeonTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: It took a lot of ironing to get the wrinkles out even after washing but I am completely satisfied after that. And it does seem to be wrinkle resistant to new wrinkles. Wasn't sure what to expect from microfiber. It is soft. The flat sheet does cling to the fitted sheet though when trying to make the bed, you can't pull it you have to lift it to move it. This quality does seem to help keep the top sheet tucked in under the mattress by the fitted sheet. Overall very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell A. Haertl

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but consider lint with dark colors
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are comfortable. Not as soft as some of the microfiber sheets we've had, but nice. The one thing I didn't think of was how quickly they'd look dirty. I ordered the navy sheets and they look fantastic, but any bit of lint or pet hair shows up very quickly and doesn't brush off well. They are easy to wash and dry, so the sheets get changed a lot more often. I don't think it's so much an issue with quality as it is the dark color. No pets or lint, no problem!
customer_reviews.author: Noll

customer_reviews.title: Mismatched color and feel
customer_reviews.text: I returned these because the fitted sheet did not match the rest of the set in color or in feel. Immediately upon opening the package I noticed a difference in color and looked at them in different lighting. Not only was the color slightly off but the feel of the fabric was different. The tags on both sheets had the same materials/percentages listed but one felt much more scratchy and rough. I wasn't thrilled about the feel of any of it so I opted to return them. I had ordered the charcoal grey. Maybe it's only a problem with certain colors, but I won't be trying any others from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: A. M-Pose

customer_reviews.title: Really impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I was truthfully kind of afraid to purchase these from some of the reviews I read before purchasing, but decided to take the plunge and try them. So glad I did! The price, for one, is really good and the fabric is pretty good quality. Straight out of the package I didn’t notice any weird factory smell and they weren’t overly wrinkled. They felt soft even before washing. They seem to be pretty thick but not too hot or heavy. It fits perfectly over my pillow top as this is sometimes an issue with sheets unless they specifically say deep pockets. The color is a bright white and look great. Really happy with these!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Gross

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable; wash & air dry really well; excellent fit
customer_reviews.text: We love these – they're very comfortable, fit perfectly over our king-size bed and its fairly poofy quilted mattress cover; they wash well (cold water, no scratchy items such as towels in their load) and air dry really quickly. The price is excellent. We have them in four colors and so can mix or match sheets and pillowcases for some variety. Also, we use them in queen-size on our Aerobeds, with and without mattress pads. I store them in the zippered plastic bag they come packed in; it keeps the linen closet much neater, there's no hunting for the pillowcases, and they're separated from sheet sets in other sizes.
customer_reviews.author: twigs

customer_reviews.title: Very nice sheets at a very nice price
customer_reviews.text: Nice sheets, great price, color and feel are great, fit is just a bit loose, enough to drop them a star but not too bad. I have a pillow top mattress and was worried that they might be too small when I ordered them, definitely not the case here. First time with microfiber for sheet and I am pleasantly surprised. Very soft, almost satin like, different from cotton, but very nice. Inexpensive but not cheaply made
customer_reviews.author: Michael S

customer_reviews.title: luxurious sheets!
customer_reviews.text: Not only were these affordable but they were a gift from my in-laws! They’re extremely soft and luxurious feeling for the price point. I washed them upon arrival because they had a weird chemically odor but it went away and fixed easily with detergent and dryer sheets. I love them, and hope they wear well after multiple sleeps and washed. We plan on order a second set for laundry days!
customer_reviews.author: Arianna Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Great for picky people!
customer_reviews.text: My fiancé is very particular about the quality of our sheets, so he wasn’t too pleased to see that I bought sheets at this price off of Amazon. He thought they would be too cheap and uncomfortable! Not at all. He loves these sheets, and so do I. They are incredibly soft and comfortable. Will be ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice black sheets
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with Utopia’s Black Sheets for Twin size bed. The material is soft. Not too thin. Just right. Very spacious flat sheet. The fitted sheet fits nicely & wraps around the mattress perfectly with deep pockets for the edges. They washed wonderfully with very little wrinkles after the wash as well as when I make my Son’s bed which usually really needs making! Will definitely purchase this brand again in the future when needed.
customer_reviews.author: meshelle

customer_reviews.title: Not as soft as reviews led me to think
customer_reviews.text: It is in fact wrinkle free, but that hasn’t really been an issue I have ever had from sheets. It’s not super soft like other reviews were claiming. I have a set of cotton sheets from ikea that were like 250 thread count and it was about as soft as those. For the price though, it works, and also it’s hard to hunt down full sized white sheets in the store, so this was convenient. Update: sheets are kind of stretching
customer_reviews.author: Kaela

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic bed sheets!!
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are great!! They're so soft and light. They come out of the dryer wrinkle free!! Though I would recommend putting a fabric sheet in with them as they are full of static. I had ordered several sheets from Utopia and liked them so much I ordered them for the spare bedroom. The pillowcases are the right size for the set you order and have a longer opening on one side so you can tuck the pillow in it. The colors have not faded with multiple washings. I recommend these sheets!
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable sheets that don't slip
customer_reviews.text: My son is a pretty wild sleeper and he has never yanked these off. They fit his bed snugly and have never slipped unlike all of the other sets I have purchased for his bed. He has a tendency to shove the flat sheet to the foot of his bed but doesn't with these. He said they are so comfortable he likes using the flat sheet now. I liked them so much I purchased another set in another color. The price is definitely right for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Searching for quality

product_meta.title: Utopia Bedding Bed Sheet Set - 3 Piece Twin Bedding - Soft Brushed Microfiber Fabric - Shrinkage & Fade Resistant - Easy Care (Twin, White)
feature_bullets: BED SHEET SET - Twin size 3-piece bed sheet set comprising of 1 flat sheet measuring 66 by 96 inches with a 2 inches self-hem, 1 fitted sheet measuring 39 by 75 inches with a 15 inches box and 1 pillowcase measuring 20 by 30 inches with a 4 inches hem
BRUSHED MICROFIBER - Brushed microfiber fabric makes the sheet set exceptionally soft
SMOOTH AND COMFORTABLE - The smooth feel of the sheet is very cozy which keeps you cool during summers and warm during winters
SHRINK AND FADE RESISTANT - The microfiber material is processed to make it resistant to shrinkage and fading which adds to the longevity of the set by keeping it in great condition
CARE INSTRUCTIONS - Machine wash cold (up to 40°C); do not bleach; tumble dry or iron on normal temperature

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars34,843 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
